snippet: With Iran, agreeing to meet again keeps alive the slim chance of a diplomatic solution.
abstract: Editorial holds latest round of negotiations on Iran's nuclear program have preserved dim hope of diplomatic solution, even if they were frustratingly incremental; warns against addition of excessive sanctions before a clearer picture of Iran's intentions emerges.
lead_paragraph: With Iran, agreeing to meet again keeps alive the slim chance of a diplomatic solution.

headline.seo: Another Try at Nuclear Talks With Iran
